reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa4.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Switch to frame titled 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings dialog'.
Check if the 'Connect to MPX' button is present. If not then MPX has not been previously enabled.
Get all the selected import account options and store to a list.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'File types' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'File types dialog'.
Click the 'DB TV manage fields' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPX Video for Account "DB TV" (2312945284) dialog'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPX Video for Account "DB TV" (2312945284) dialog'.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'File types' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'File types dialog'.
Click the 'DB TV edit file type' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPX Video for Account "DB TV" (2312945284) dialog'.
Select 'MPX Media Related Link' from the 'URL Alias Field' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'has been updated.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Open the mpx platform.
Enter 'mpx/AdminPub7QA' in the 'Username' text box.
Enter 'Pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Enter the account name 'DB TV' in the account select text box.
Click the account option from the drop down list.
Click the 'Account' title to leave focus off of the selection.
Wait for account to switch to the newly selected account.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Click the 'Choose Files' button.
Click the 'Movies' button in the OS Upload dialog.
Click the Test Movie in th OS Upload dialog.
Click the 'Open' button.
Click the 'Upload' button in the Upload dialog.
Click the 'Available Date' label on the right hand side to give focus to the media item.
Enter 'Automationd7b84ad130' in the 'Title' text box.
Enter 'canonicalurlc60158cd63' in the 'Canonical URL' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Publish' button.
Click the 'Publish to Pub 7 Primary' check box.
Click the 'Publish' button from the upload dialog.
Open url 'http://qa4.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Status report dialog'.
Verify success message of 'Cron ran successfully.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Files' menu link.
Click the 'mpxMedia' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content dialog'.
Enter title Automationd7b84ad130.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Get the text of the first search result set item.
Click the first search title link in the search result set.
Verify the text 'MPX Media Related Link:' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'canonicalurlc60158cd63' is present on the page.
